subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen had a 4-point play with 6.7 seconds left that put host Miami ahead for good, Chris Bosh scored 40 points and the Heat held off the Denver Nuggets, 119-116, on Saturday night.
snippet: Ray Allen had a 4-point play with 6.7 seconds left that put host Miami ahead for good, Chris Bosh scored 40 points and the Heat held off the Denver Nuggets, 119-116, on Saturday night.
